backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report declaring no collected features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file mapping frontend file paths to short human-written descriptions of each component and asset.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable setup defining light/dark color tokens and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint providing the root div and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Simple wrapper component that renders ValentineApp.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity auth context and provider handling login, stored identities, and status management.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based romantic pink theme with light/dark mode variables, fonts, and fade-in animation.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entrypoint configuring query client and identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/ValentineApp.tsx: Main interactive Valentine UI with Yes/No buttons, dodging No behavior, and meme reveal after Yes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, radius, animations, and plugins for the themed UI.
project_state.json: Holds the project’s metadata, feature list, and pending requests for an interactive Valentine webpage with a dodging No button and a meme reveal on Yes. Provides design notes, requirements, and styling expectations for an iPad‑friendly single HTML file.
